metadata.name: KGF CHARITY x sashimi
metadata.description:
This is a KGF CHARITY 1/1 charity auction piece made in collaboration with the Killer GF team and [sashimi](https://twitter.com/ssm_a_u), a female illustrator from Japan known for her cute and vibrant style.

sashimi's charity of choice is the [Ukraine Emergency Response Fund](https://thegivingblock.com/campaigns/ukraine-emergency-response-fund/), a fund providing for humanitarian relief organizations that focus on providing urgent medical care and aid to children, individuals, families, and animals. 

The KGF CHARITY collection is an ongoing series of 1/1 NFTs organized by the Killer GF Team and featuring various artists from the NFT space. All funds received from the auction will be split 3 ways, with proceeds going evenly towards the Killer GF team, the artist, and a charity chosen by the artist!

All bidders will receive a bid stamp as a thank you from the Killer GF team and sashimi.
